author: Joe Rossignol
title: Amazon Alexa Now Supports Apple Podcasts in Over 40 Countries
description:
Alexa now natively supports Apple Podcasts on Amazon Echo and Amazon Fire TV devices in over 40 countries following the latest expansion of this integration.





Apple Podcasts for Alexa is now available in Argentina, Australia, Austria, Belgium, Brazil, Can…
